headerDisplay: Currently this plugin uses the [MySmartBlinds Smart Bridge](https://www.mysmartblinds.com/products/smart-hub) (purchased separately from the blind automation kits) to control the blinds. If you don't have the bridge, check [homebridge-mysmartblinds](https://www.npmjs.com/package/homebridge-mysmartblinds) which uses bluetooh (this method may be integrated into this plugin at a later date).
